jobTitle: Senior Data Engineer C# API NoSQL
jobDescription: A rapidly growing Financial Services firm is seeking a Senior Data Engineer to join our Data and Analytics Team. The ideal candidate is a self-starter who is effective working with large development teams in a highly collaborative environment.TITLE: Senior Data Engineer (T-SQL, NoSQL, C#, API, ETL, Big Data Dev)  WORK LOCATION: Chicago Loop (4 Blocks From Metra)TARGET COMP (Flexible based on experience): $130K + Bonus + Benefits (Flexible for more experienced candidate) A rapidly growing Financial Services firm is seeking a Senior Data Engineer to join our Data and Analytics Team. The ideal candidate is a self-starter who is effective working with large development teams in a highly collaborative environment. Job Description:Develop, maintain, test, and troubleshoot data solutions, including Database Development, ETL / Data Migration Development, and Big Data Development.Collaborate with technical and non-technical resources to solve issues and develop new functionality.Participate in Requirements Gathering and Analysis meetings with Team Members, Internal Customers, and Stakeholders.Mentors and assists Data Engineers and Data Developers as needed.RequirementsDatabase development skills (SQL, T-SQL)SQL Server 2012 or laterSQL Server 2016 Experience is a plusETL / Data IntegrationAzure and Cloud Based TechnologiesSQL AzureSSISSQL Performance Tuning and OptimizationTroubleshooting of complex data solutionsBig Data Technologies including (Azure Data Factory, Spark, NoSQL, Hadoop, HDInsight, Big Data Architecture) a plusData AnalysisRequirements AnalysisRequired ExperienceBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or relevant experience.5 + Years development experience with SQL and TSQL using SQL Server 2012 or later.5 + Years development experience using ETL / Data Integration Tools (SSIS preferred).3 + Years of experience performing Data Analysis / Data Profiling.5 + Years of requirements analysis experience.5 + Years of experience working in environments with formal SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) experience, 3 + years of experience working on teams utilizing Agile Methodologies.3 + Years authoring technical and functional documentation.Experience working on large teams a plus.Experience with Project Planning and more specifically sprint planning a plus.provided by Dice SQL, C#, API Development, NoSQL Databases, Azure, ETL, Data Integration
